Project Management beyond Gantt Chart Drawing

<< functions << Table Of Contents >> gaplength >>

Keyword gapduration

Purpose
Specifies the minimum required gap between the start or end of a preceding task and the start of this task, or the start or end of a following task and the end of this task. This is calendar time, not working time. 7d means one week.
Syntax gapduration <duration> (min | h | d | w | m | y)
Arguments duration
The duration of the interval. May not be 0 and must be a multiple of timingresolution.
min
minutes
h
hours
d
days
w
weeks
m
months
y
years
Context depends, precedes
